name: mri_surfcluster
description: A tool for clustering vertices on a cortical surface based on intensity values.

inputs.name: Input File
inputs.description: Source of surface values

inputs.name: Minimum Intensity Threshold
inputs.description: Minimum intensity threshold

inputs.name: Threshold Sign
inputs.description: Sign of threshold criteria (abs, pos, neg)

inputs.name: No Adjust Flag
inputs.description: Do not adjust threshold for one-tailed tests

inputs.name: False Discovery Rate
inputs.description: Set thmin with False Discovery Rate

inputs.name: Subject ID
inputs.description: Source surface subject (can be ico)

inputs.name: Hemisphere
inputs.description: Cortical hemisphere, either lh or rh

inputs.name: Surface
inputs.description: Coordinates from surface (e.g., white)

inputs.name: Surface Path
inputs.description: Full path to surface

inputs.name: Annotation Name
inputs.description: Report annotation for max vertex (e.g., aparc)

inputs.name: Frame Number
inputs.description: 0-based frame number of the input file

inputs.name: CSD File(s)
inputs.description: Load one or more CSD files

inputs.name: Voxel-wise Significances Map
inputs.description: Map of corrected voxel-wise significances

inputs.name: Cluster-wise Significances Map
inputs.description: Map of cluster-wise significances

inputs.name: Max Cluster P-Value File
inputs.description: Save p-value of the largest (max) cluster

inputs.name: Bonferroni Correction
inputs.description: Apply Bonferroni correction across N spaces

inputs.name: Sig to P Max Flag
inputs.description: Convert max from sig to p

inputs.name: Bonferroni Max Value
inputs.description: Apply Bonferroni correction to maximum

inputs.name: CSD PDF File
inputs.description: Compute PDF/CDF of CSD data and save

inputs.name: CSD PDF Only Flag
inputs.description: Only write the CSD PDF file

inputs.name: Merged CSD Output File
inputs.description: Write out merged CSD files as one

inputs.name: Cluster-wise P-Value Threshold
inputs.description: Cluster-wise threshold

inputs.name: FWHM
inputs.description: FWHM in mm^2 for GRF

inputs.name: FWHM Data File
inputs.description: Text file with FWHM in mm^2 for GRF

inputs.name: Constrain Label File
inputs.description: Constrain cluster search to be inside or outside clabel

inputs.name: Cortex Flag
inputs.description: Set clabel to be subject/label/hemi.cortex.label

inputs.name: Mask File
inputs.description: Constrain to be within mask

inputs.name: Mask Inversion Flag
inputs.description: Constrain cluster search to be outside mask or clabel

inputs.name: Centroid Flag
inputs.description: Report centroid instead of location of maximum stat

inputs.name: Summary File
inputs.description: Text file to store cluster summary

inputs.name: Pointset File
inputs.description: File that can be read into Freeview with -c

inputs.name: Max Area File
inputs.description: Write area of largest cluster to this file

inputs.name: Output ID
inputs.description: Output file with non-clusters set to 0

inputs.name: Output Cluster Number ID
inputs.description: Output file where value is cluster number

inputs.name: Output Labels Base
inputs.description: Output clusters as labels

inputs.name: Output Annotation Name
inputs.description: Output clusters as an annotation

inputs.name: Minimum Area
inputs.description: Area threshold for a cluster (mm^2)

inputs.name: Transform File
inputs.description: Talairach transform file

inputs.name: No Fix MNI Flag
inputs.description: Do not fix MNI Talairach coordinates

inputs.name: Subjects Directory
inputs.description: FreeSurfer subjects directory

inputs.name: Maximum Intensity Threshold
inputs.description: Maximum intensity threshold

output-files.name: Clustered Surface File
output-files.description: Filtered surface file with non-cluster vertices set to 0

output-files.name: Cluster Number Surface File
output-files.description: Surface file with cluster number per vertex

output-files.name: Summary File
output-files.description: Text summary file of clustering results

output-files.name: Pointset File
output-files.description: Pointset file for visualization in Freeview

output-files.name: Max Area Summary
output-files.description: File containing the area of the largest cluster

author: FreeSurfer Developers
